org.araneaframework.framework
Interface TransactionContext

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardTransactionFilterWidget
public interface TransactionContext
extends Serializable

TransactionContext filters routing of duplicate requests. The detection of duplicate requests is achieved through defining a transaction ID by getTransactionId() and checking its consistency with isConsistent().

Author:
"Toomas RÃ¶mer" , Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)

Field Summary
static String OVERRIDE_KEY
          The key in the request that indicates situation where transaction ID was overridden on purpose.
static String TRANSACTION_ID_KEY
          The key in the request, under which is the transaction ID.
 
Method Summary
 Long getNextTransactionId()
          Provides the generated transaction ID that will be expected in the next request.
 Object getTransactionId()
          Provides the transaction ID of the current request.
 boolean isConsistent()
          Specifies whether the current request is consistent with the expected transaction ID.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

isConsistent

boolean isConsistent()
Specifies whether the current request is consistent with the expected transaction ID.

Returns:
true, if current request is consistent.

getTransactionId

Object getTransactionId()
Provides the transaction ID of the current request.

Returns:
The current transaction ID.

getNextTransactionId

Long getNextTransactionId()
Provides the generated transaction ID that will be expected in the next request.

Returns:
The new transaction ID.
